name: Momentary Delay
description: This is an example that shows how to use the fx_delay effect to create a delay effect that can be activated with momentarily with a  footswitch like in dub songs.  Regular music and then you hold down the left footswitch and things will be delayed.  Release the footswitch but the delays still ring out.
left-pot-function: Basically how long the echo lasts before dying out
center-pot-function: How far apart the echos are (0.1 to 3 seconds)
right-pot-function: The mix of clean audio and the echo effect.  All the way left  is no effect at all and all the way right is effect only with none of the original  dry signal.  Right in the middle (12:00) is a nice mix of the original dry signal and the echo signal
right-switch-function: Tap it a few times at a set interval and the delay will lock on
creator: DreamMaker
